question: You are applying for a job and need a letter of referenceWrite letter to a former teacher .Give deatils of the jobexplain why it is important to yousuggest what information your teacher could put in the refernece
text: Hope this finds you well. Sorry, I could not write to you for a while, because I had a rough time on the  job hunt.

In the end, found  one, that matches  my  qualifications and I am going to apply for that. In the advertisement I saw, they are asking me to send a reference letter along with my CV. So, it would be nice if you can provide me with a reference sign.

Since  I am a fresh graduate with no prior job experience, it was really hard to find  one. The competition was too tough. Moreover, my father is going to retire at the end of November, so it adds   extra pressure  because I am the one who needs to grab his responsibilities.
So, please consider adding your personal address, mobile number, and  email address when you write the letter of reference.
It would be a great help for me if you can send your letter as soon as possible, since the application closing date is on 24th September. I look forward to hearing from you.
